hero.title: Smart Desktop File Organizer
hero.subtitle: Keep your desktop clean and boost productivity
hero.description: FileZen is a powerful desktop file management tool that automatically organizes your files, making your workspace more organized.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Comprehensive file management solutions for you

auto_organize.title: Auto Organization
auto_organize.description: Intelligently recognizes file types and automatically categorizes them into appropriate folders

smart_rules.title: Smart Rules
smart_rules.description: Customize organization rules to make file management more suited to your habits

batch_operations.title: Batch Operations
batch_operations.description: Support batch renaming, moving, copying and other operations to improve efficiency

safe_backup.title: Safe Backup
safe_backup.description: Automatically backup important files to ensure data security

reservation.title: Reserve Experience
reservation.subtitle: Leave your contact information and we'll notify you first when the product launches
reservation.success: Reservation successful! We'll contact you soon.
reservation.success_message: Thank you for your reservation! We have received your information and will notify you first when the product is officially released.

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Please tell us your expectations or suggestions for the product (optional)

form.privacy_notice: We promise to protect your privacy and will not share your personal information with third parties.

footer.description: FileZen is committed to providing users with the best desktop file management experience.
footer.additional_info: This product is under development, please stay tuned for the official release.
